title: What is Prayer to a Skeptic? Jordan Peterson Encourages a Deep Dive
description:
Since Michael and I have had several fruitful conversations, 
Paul asked if the three of us could talk together. Michael had the idea of beginning with prayer.  

Jordan Peterson Sam Harris Bret Weinstein Vancouver 1 https://youtu.be/d-Z9EZE8kpo

Karen's Story https://youtu.be/ZC03aNsPHOQ
Paul's first conversation with Karen https://youtu.be/HlMgGkwWUNY
Karen's Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgp_...
Paul's first conversation with Michael https://youtu.be/82SzWEmQHCI
Paul's second conversation with Michael https://youtu.be/s9C4VR9CyjM

Annette Poizner conversation that was retweeted by Jordan Peterson
https://youtu.be/flujUMrKIvE

Recent videos exploring ideas with Michael
The Dragon of Chaos and Corona
https://youtu.be/iUznC6iI02A
Maps of Meaning, pp. 140 to 141 and the symbolism of truth, reality, meaning, chaos, 
the ground of being.  And Corona.
https://youtu.be/XLYQmknDCQQ

Exploring topics for this conversation with Paul VanderKlay. 
https://youtu.be/rH24Hth58dE

And if anyone is interested in knowing more about the ideas on this channel, there are so many wonderful guests
and great content starting at the beginning.  This is the very first video, the one Michael referenced with Alex.
https://youtu.be/YttxOqlLLaQ

There are also a number of them with Alex and Michael in conversation.
Conversation notes
JBP phenomenological experiment with the act of prayer in Vancouver 1

It will, by your own definition improve your life

As soon as you start interacting with that highest ideal it simultaneously becomes a judge

Highest ideal is the same as highest self? 

Spirit of geometry vs the spirit of finesse

Right brain phenomenon

The attempt to conceive of it as an ideal, you hold it there to have a conversation with. 

Personality 2017 Number 12

Karen’s interview

A man should look for a woman with whom he can contend

Vervaeke talking to an imaginary partner

Some of JBP’s most profound things get glossed over because they are so simple

Tell the truth, or at least don’t lie

The relationship between the two things, is its own thing

CS Lewis and Owen Barfield, the Great War

What is the nature of truth itself

Monarchical Vision

Conversation with Annette, Kabbala

Pestilence: deber: also speech and matter

Corruption of language

Michael Leighty

Challenge and charity

How many conversations have an imprint from Jordan

Stochastic resonance 

“God had to be in the conversation”

Karen’s meetup

Christianeze

Something that bridges the gap between the you and the I, a larger consciousness that bridges it

The errors that come down, Previous conversation

Past and the present get compressed together

You need to enter the conversation believing that there is something you need to know

Coronavirus, a space where I can look to see where I can have gratitude. Where is God in this moment. There is this space and it’s covering the whole globe. In this space something is happening, much of which we can approach with gratitude. The same picture as the picture of this conversation. 

Fist shaking gets you nowhere
Pity party gets you nowhere

I’m here, maybe I can’t be thankful, but I can be thankful for what comes out of it. 

Anomaly, the stumbling stone, the falling into chaos

Go voluntarily into the chaos to find the treasures. 

Let’s go treasure hunting! 

Expansion in the definition of what we think of as Christian

David Bentley Hart’s recent book

Click here to meetup with other viewers of Paul's channel for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent Paul VanderKlay videos if this link doesn't work.

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/p... 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 


To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jor...

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7b...
